column4: Could someone please tell me how I can disable my onboard video card because its causing conflicts with my pci nvida card. Please note that I do not have the option to turn it off or choose which card in particuliar I wanna use in my bios!!!
there is probly a jumper on your motherboard
hmm possibly. however, in the past, when using Suse or previous versions of Ubuntu, it was possible to turn it off without touch the motherboard it self... dunno why it wont do it now!
yeah you could unload the module
